agentCard.name: Customer Support Verification Agent Factory Agent
agentCard.description: Customer Support Verification Agent Factory - generates specialized customer service verification agents using selective agent factory reuse (Core, RAG, Consistency, Web Search) for support ticket classification, response quality verification, customer satisfaction prediction, SLA compliance monitoring, multi-channel support coordination, agent performance evaluation, and knowledge base accuracy verification
